questions.question: Which african country makes the best jellof rice?
questions.feedback: Senegal makes the best jellof rice.

questions.question: Who wrote 'Romeo and Juliet'?
questions.feedback: William Shakespeare penned the play in the early stages of his career and first performed around 1596.

questions.question: What is the capital of Japan?
questions.feedback: Tokyo, the capital of Japan, is situated at the head of Tokyo Bay on the Pacific coast of central Honshu.
